job_history.work_description: Polysomnogram preparation and set up, diagnostic testing, PAP and oxygen titration studies, monitoring and scoring complete patient studies using AASM standards, data transfers, Windows OS, work diligently with minimal supervision in a 1:2 technologist to patient ratio.

Performing EEG and LTM, measuring in 10-20, patient preparation and education, monitor and note abnormalities, sleep study preparation & set up, prepare & calibrate equipment prior to testing, following AASM protocol for MSLT, MWT, PAP and oxygen studies, assist with scoring sleep studies.
Clinical patient evaluation in home setting, implement disease management programs, respiratory & sleep equipment set up and education, billing patients in outpatient sleep center.

skills.name: Polysomnogram Preparation and Setup
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in preparing and setting up polysomnogram tests, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Diagnostic Testing
skills.explanation: Has performed various diagnostic tests, including PAP and oxygen titration studies, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Monitoring and Scoring
skills.explanation: Has monitored and scored complete patient studies using AASM standards, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Transfers
skills.explanation: Has experience with data transfers, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Windows OS
skills.explanation: Has used Windows OS in a professional setting, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: EEG and LTM
skills.explanation: Has performed EEG and LTM, measuring in 10-20, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Patient Preparation and Education
skills.explanation: Has prepared and educated patients for sleep studies, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Equipment Calibration
skills.explanation: Has prepared and calibrated equipment prior to testing, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Clinical Patient Evaluation
skills.explanation: Has evaluated patients in a clinical setting, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Disease Management Programs
skills.explanation: Has implemented disease management programs, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Respiratory and Sleep Equipment Setup
skills.explanation: Has set up respiratory and sleep equipment, indicating a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Healthcare Information Management
skills.explanation: Has some knowledge of healthcare information management, but lacks extensive experience.

skills.name: Healthcare Technology
